name: Iphone 14 pro
info: The iPhone 14 Pro is a flagship smartphone from Apple, known for its cutting-edge technology and sleek design. With powerful performance, a stunning display, and advanced camera capabilities, it sets a new standard in the world of mobile devices. Elevate your mobile experience with the iPhone 14 Pro.

name: Pixel 7
info: The Pixel 7 is Google's latest smartphone, offering top-notch performance and an exceptional camera system. Its clean, minimalist design is complemented by a vibrant display, making it a stylish choice for tech enthusiasts. Experience the best of Android with the Pixel 7.
memory: 128 or 256 GB of storage and 8 GB of RAM

name: M1 Macbook Air
desc: Apple Mabook Air with apple silicon
info: The M1 MacBook Air redefines laptop performance with Apple's groundbreaking M1 chip, delivering lightning-fast speeds and extraordinary efficiency. Its sleek and ultra-thin design, along with a stunning Retina display, offers a premium computing experience. Experience unparalleled power and portability with the M1 MacBook Air.

name: Playstation 5
info: The PS5 is Sony's cutting-edge gaming console, boasting stunning 4K graphics and ultra-fast load times for an immersive gaming experience. Its futuristic design and innovative DualSense controller bring a new level of immersion to gaming. Dive into a world of gaming excellence with the PS5.

name: Airpods Pro
info: AirPods Pro deliver an unparalleled audio experience with active noise cancellation, immersive sound, and a customizable fit for ultimate comfort. These wireless earbuds seamlessly integrate with Apple devices and provide easy access to Siri, making them a top choice for music lovers and tech enthusiasts. Elevate your listening experience with AirPods Pro.

name: ipad Pro
info: The iPad Pro is a powerhouse tablet with incredible performance, powered by Apple's M1 chip, offering desktop-class capabilities in a sleek, portable design. Its Liquid Retina XDR display showcases stunning visuals and color accuracy for creative and professional tasks. With support for the Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard, the iPad Pro is the ultimate tool for productivity and creativity.
camera: 12MP sensor and a 122â€‘degree field of view

name: Galaxy S22 Ultra
info: The Galaxy S22 Ultra is Samsung's flagship smartphone, combining exceptional power with an expansive AMOLED display and versatile camera system for stunning photos and videos. Its sleek design and S Pen compatibility enhance productivity and creativity. Elevate your mobile experience with the Galaxy S22 Ultra.

name: Galaxy S23 Ultra
info: The Galaxy S23 Ultra is Samsung's flagship smartphone, combining exceptional power with an expansive AMOLED display and versatile camera system for stunning photos and videos. Its sleek design and S Pen compatibility enhance productivity and creativity. Elevate your mobile experience with the Galaxy S23 Ultra.

name: VR Gear
info: The Samsung VR Gear is a virtual reality headset that offers immersive 3D experiences, taking you to another world with stunning visuals and 360-degree content. Its comfortable design and easy-to-use controls provide hours of entertainment and gaming. Step into the future of virtual reality with Samsung VR Gear.

name: hp Notebook
desc: hp with high quality graphics Notebook
info: The HP notebook is a reliable and versatile laptop, ideal for work and entertainment, with a sleek and portable design. It offers powerful performance, a vibrant display, and long battery life, making it a practical choice for on-the-go computing. Experience productivity and entertainment in one package with the HP notebook.
